verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַת־ <WH8141> In the year מוֹת֙ <WH4194> died הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> that king עֻזִּיָּ֔הוּ <WH5818> Uzziah וָאֶרְאֶ֧ה <WH7200> I saw אֶת־ <WH853> also אֲדֹנָ֛י <WH136> the Lord יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> sitting עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֖א <WH3678> upon a throne רָ֣ם <WH7311> high וְנִשָּׂ֑א <WH5375> and lifted up וְשׁוּלָ֖יו <WH7757> and his train מְלֵאִ֥ים <WH4390> filling אֶת־ <WH853> הַהֵיכָֽל׃ <WH1964> the temple

שְׂרָפִ֨ים <WH8314> the seraphims עֹמְדִ֤ים ׀ <WH5975> it stood מִמַּ֙עַל֙ <WH4605> Above ל֔וֹ שֵׁ֧שׁ <WH8337> had six כְּנָפַ֛יִם <WH3671> wings שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six כְּנָפַ֖יִם <WH3671> wings לְאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> each one בִּשְׁתַּ֣יִם ׀ <WH8147> with twain יְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> he covered פָנָ֗יו <WH6440> his face וּבִשְׁתַּ֛יִם <WH8147> and with twain יְכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> he covered רַגְלָ֖יו <WH7272> his feet וּבִשְׁתַּ֥יִם <WH8147> and with twain יְעוֹפֵֽף׃ <WH5774> he did fly

וְקָרָ֨א <WH7121> And one cried זֶ֤ה <WH2088> and one אֶל־ <WH413> to זֶה֙ <WH2088> another וְאָמַ֔ר <WH559> unto another and said קָד֧וֹשׁ ׀ <WH6918> Holy קָד֛וֹשׁ <WH6918> holy קָד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> holy יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> [is] the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts מְלֹ֥א <WH4393> [is] full כָל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the whole earth כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <WH3519> of his glory

וַיָּנֻ֙עוּ֙ <WH5128> moved אַמּ֣וֹת <WH520> And the posts הַסִּפִּ֔ים <WH5592> of the door מִקּ֖וֹל <WH6963> at the voice הַקּוֹרֵ֑א <WH7121> of him that cried וְהַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> and the house יִמָּלֵ֥א <WH4390> was filled עָשָֽׁן׃ <WH6227> with smoke

וָאֹמַ֞ר <WH559> Then said אֽוֹי־ <WH188> I Woe לִ֣י כִֽי־ <WH3588> Because נִדְמֵ֗יתִי <WH1820> [is] me for I am undone כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> because I [am] a man טְמֵֽא־ <WH2931> of unclean שְׂפָתַ֙יִם֙ <WH8193> lips אָנֹ֔כִי <WH595> I וּבְתוֹךְ֙ <WH8432> in the midst עַם־ <WH5971> of a people טְמֵ֣א <WH2931> of unclean שְׂפָתַ֔יִם <WH8193> lips אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> and I יוֹשֵׁ֑ב <WH3427> and I dwell כִּ֗י <WH3588> Because אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> the King יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts רָא֥וּ <WH7200> have seen עֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> for mine eyes

וַיָּ֣עָף <WH5774> Then flew אֵלַ֗י <WH413> then אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one מִן־ <WH4480> at הַשְּׂרָפִ֔ים <WH8314> of the seraphims וּבְיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> in his hand רִצְפָּ֑ה <WH7531> unto me having a live coal בְּמֶ֨לְקַחַ֔יִם <WH4457> with the tongs לָקַ֖ח <WH3947> [which] he had taken מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> from off the altar

וַיַּגַּ֣ע <WH5060> And he laid עַל־ <WH5921> and פִּ֔י <WH6310> [it] upon my mouth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold נָגַ֥ע <WH5060> Lo this hath touched זֶ֖ה <WH2088> this עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׂפָתֶ֑יךָ <WH8193> thy lips וְסָ֣ר <WH5493> is taken away עֲוֹנֶ֔ךָ <WH5771> and thine iniquity וְחַטָּאתְךָ֖ <WH2403> and thy sin תְּכֻפָּֽר׃ <WH3722> purged

וָאֶשְׁמַ֞ע <WH8085> Also I heard אֶת־ <WH853> ק֤וֹל <WH6963> the voice אֲדֹנָי֙ <WH136> of the Lord אֹמֵ֔ר <WH559> saying אֶת־ <WH853> מִ֥י <WH4310> Whom אֶשְׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> Whom shall I send וּמִ֣י <WH4310> and who יֵֽלֶךְ־ <WH1980> will go לָ֑נוּ וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> for us? Then said הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> am I שְׁלָחֵֽנִי׃ <WH7971> I Here [am] I send

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> Go וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> and tell לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> Hear שָׁמ֙וֹעַ֙ <WH8085> ye indeed וְאַל־ <WH408> not תָּבִ֔ינוּ <WH995> but understand וּרְא֥וּ <WH7200> not and see רָא֖וֹ <WH7200> ye indeed וְאַל־ <WH408> but תֵּדָֽעוּ׃ <WH3045> but perceive

הַשְׁמֵן֙ <WH8080> fat לֵב־ <WH3820> Make the heart הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> of this וְאָזְנָ֥יו <WH241> and make their ears הַכְבֵּ֖ד <WH3513> heavy וְעֵינָ֣יו <WH5869> their eyes הָשַׁ֑ע <WH8173> and shut פֶּן־ <WH6435> Otherwise יִרְאֶ֨ה <WH7200> lest they see בְעֵינָ֜יו <WH5869> with their eyes וּבְאָזְנָ֣יו <WH241> with their ears יִשְׁמָ֗ע <WH8085> and hear וּלְבָב֥וֹ <WH3824> with their heart יָבִ֛ין <WH995> and understand וָשָׁ֖ב <WH7725> and convert וְרָ֥פָא <WH7495> and be healed לֽוֹ׃

וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> Then said עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֖י <WH4970> how אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> I Lord וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> how long? And he answered עַ֣ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> after אִם־ <WH518> lo שָׁא֨וּ <WH7582> be wasted עָרִ֜ים <WH5892> Until the cities מֵאֵ֣ין <WH369> without יוֹשֵׁ֗ב <WH3427> without inhabitant וּבָתִּים֙ <WH1004> and the houses מֵאֵ֣ין <WH369> are without אָדָ֔ם <WH120> without man וְהָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> and the land תִּשָּׁאֶ֥ה <WH7582> desolate שְׁמָמָֽה׃ <WH8077> be utterly

וְרִחַ֥ק <WH7368> far away יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָדָ֑ם <WH120> men וְרַבָּ֥ה <WH7227> and [there be] a great הָעֲזוּבָ֖ה <WH5805> forsaking בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וְע֥וֹד <WH5750> Yet בָּהּ֙ עֲשִׂ֣רִיָּ֔ה <WH6224> But yet in it [shall be] a tenth וְשָׁ֖בָה <WH7725> and [it] shall return וְהָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> be to לְבָעֵ֑ר <WH1197> and shall be eaten כָּאֵלָ֣ה <WH424> as a teil tree וְכָאַלּ֗וֹן <WH437> and as an oak אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Whose בְּשַׁלֶּ֙כֶת֙ <WH7995> [is] in them when they cast מַצֶּ֣בֶת <WH4678> whose substance בָּ֔ם זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> seed קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> [their leaves so] the holy מַצַּבְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH4678> [shall be] the substance פ
